name: v0.9.0 - Vertical Modules, SDOH Screening & Dynamic Voice Tools
body:
## What's New in v0.9.0

### Omni-Channel Platform
Connect with customers across 12 messaging channels from a single interface. Each channel has a unified adapter with setup wizard, OAuth flows, health monitoring, and webhook routing.

**Channels:** WhatsApp Business, Telegram, Slack, Microsoft Teams, WeChat, Facebook Messenger, Instagram Direct, LINE, Viber, Discord, SMS (Twilio), Email (Resend)

### Unified Agent Builder
Agent Builder, Voice Agents, and Voice AI consolidated into one builder with 7 configuration tabs — Identity, Goals, Script, Skills Marketplace, Execution, Optimization (A/B testing), and Runtime Adaptations. Agents can now be linked to campaigns and conversations, and each agent has a dedicated chat endpoint for testing.

### Voice Infrastructure
- **Dual-stack telephony:** SIP (Janus Gateway on Cloudflare Containers, B3Networks bridge) and Telnyx with audio recording to R2
- **xAI Grok** as default LLM with intelligent model routing
- **Minimax TTS** with per-agent and per-tenant voice configuration
- **Dynamic tool dispatch:** voice agents now use their own tool definitions instead of hardcoded lead capture tools
- **Call Logs page** with unified SIP + Telnyx query and recording playback

### Vertical Industry Modules
Module framework supporting industry-specific archetypes, tool definitions, disposition codes, and prompts. Ships with 4 verticals: healthcare, real estate, debt collection, and retail.

- **Healthcare SDOH Screening:** archetype following Healthy People 2030 framework with 11 intervention tools, 6 disposition codes, and HIPAA-compliant prompt with crisis routing (911/988)
- **Disposition auto-tagging:** contacts automatically tagged based on call outcomes using industry-specific templates

### CLI Control Plane
Full-featured CLI (`kira`) with 276 subcommands — SSO login, agent management, campaigns, contacts, conversations, workflows, documents, MCP registry, voice providers, channels, and database sync/export/import. Includes shell completion and JSON/table/minimal output formatters.

### Workflows & Automation
30 pre-built workflow templates across 6 industries (healthcare, retail, telecoms, transportation, travel, finance). Workflow canvas with improved layout, AI Decision panel, execution history, and phone call node support.

### Security & Compliance
- **Compliance framework:** LGPD, HIPAA, CFM, PDPA, GDPR declarations per tenant
- **Adaptive security guardrails** (Phase 1 + 2) with fail-closed patterns
- **Entra ID OIDC** and multi-provider auth abstraction via WorkOS AuthKit
- **Hardened API:** session token hashing, WebSocket ticket auth, PII masking, parameterized queries, CORS hardening, webhook signature verification

### Platform
- MCP server expanded from 18 to 64 tools for full CLI coverage
- Marketing deck generation system
- Data tables (TanStack Table) for Campaigns, Workflows, and Conversations
- Seed data management UI with demo data presets
- Campaign performance analytics and contact statistics API
- Dark mode improvements across all views
- CI consistency checks on pushes to main
